basic.description: This seminar will explore the assets of estate litigation including will challenges, claims against an Estate, and applications in relation to the administration of an Estate. Students will be expected to participate in role-playing exercises in class and a culminating advocacy exercise at the end of the course. LAW 462 or LAW 463 recommended, but not required.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Estate Litigation

extra.enrollment_requirement: LAW 645: Exclusion: LAW 360-364, LAW 435 or LAW 645. Prereq: LAW 225
